originalText.text: I have been buying clothes from Rojer Baron since 2008 because the tailoring is exact and the quality/durability is very good. I also appreciate that he has strong knowledge of the style trends (for tweaks to the tailoring from year to year) and has great selections of fabrics/prints to choose from. Customer service is excellent - Rojer treats all his customers like they are his most important customer!

text.text: I have been buying clothes from Rojer Baron since 2008 because the tailoring is exact and the quality/durability is very good. I also appreciate that he has strong knowledge of the style trends (for tweaks to the tailoring from year to year) and has great selections of fabrics/prints to choose from. Customer service is excellent - Rojer treats all his customers like they are his most important customer!

originalText.text: I am a HUGE fan of Lee Baron!  I have been buying my suits and dress shirts exclusively from Rojer Baron for over 18 years now.  Their selection of fabrics are extensive, and the craftsmanship is amazing.  No detail is overlooked, from working buttonholes on the jacket sleeves to an incredible selection of silk linings.  I have even hosted custom-fitting events with Rojer for some of my corporate clients, and bought them each several shirts.  They LOVE them! (who wouldn't?).  Rojer is always on top of the new fashion trends, and serves as an excellent consultant on what is right for you.  I am looking forward to receiving my next order in time for the new season!

originalText.text:
I've been buying my suits, jackets and shirts from Lee Baron Bespoke Custom Tailors for about 20 years. They offer a fantastic selection of styles and fabrics. You get honest, no pressure advice and can buy top quality custom made clothing at very reasonable prices. I'm quite often complimented and asked where I buy my clothes which is a testament to the look and quality you will find at Lee Baron.

Highly recommend you give them a try.

originalText.text: I bought two tailored suits and several tailored shirts from Lee Baron before starting law school and I could not be more satisfied. They fit perfectly, and I get compliments about them all the time. I’ve worn them to job interviews, professional events, weddings, and even the club. Also the price was extremely fair given the high quality. Highly recommend Lee Baron.

originalText.text: The team at Lee Baron were awesome when my husband needed a custom suit and shirt for a special occasion. Collaborated to pick fabrics, lining and details. Pretty fast turnaround and first fitting was near perfect. Love the suit and shirt. I will be back, again.
